text: The M4 is a long motorway in the United Kingdom. It goes from London to South Wales. It also passes Bristol. It was first called the London-South Wales Motorway. ==Junctions== {| style="margin-left:1em; margin-bottom:1em; color:black; font-size:90%;" class="wikitable" |- style="background:#0080d0;
